post.body: there's a whole site devoted to that. keepcalmandcarryon.com Nope, not kidding.
I am sorry you are injured. I confess, your package has not been mailed. I am pleading sickness.
Ha. We're barf free. (knock on wood) Hoping for fever free, or we won't go. But definitely WONT be snot and cough free.
I am loving these. I actually read "The Gift of the Magi" aloud to the fam the same day you posted that book. I love it.
I am very much improved since yesterday. Thank you for asking. Ben is still about the same.
Oh, ENVY looks really bad on me.
Heh. Just give the kids a bit of eggnog and it should all take care of itself.
Hey Kyla. How's Katie today? Any more lively?
You're on a roll today. Cracking me up.
Happy Birthday indeed!
No, I doubt it, although he'd be entitled. I, however, am famous, for no one obeys/listens/respects me tantrums.
All at once?
Ouch.
Off to bed. Reading Odd Hours. G'night tweeters.
Wondering how well we must all be to attend Christmas family gatherings. Is fever free enough?
Finished dinner. DH was very happy. Feeling like death caused me to slack a bit last week on cooking. And by a bit I mean completely.
Watching the Weekids pretend to give Curious George a breathing treatment. Somethings wrong with this picture. :)
Thinkin there's a doctor's appointment in my future. Tired of being sick. Need to get back to taking care of my family before Christmas.
Up at 4AM cause I'm feeling like poo.
Now Ben's running a fever. Crap, Crap, Crap!
